manifesto.title: THE GENESIS MANIFESTO
manifesto.desc: Digital sovereignty does not require luxury offices in San Francisco. We build independent sovereignty on efficient hardware to secure the future.
manifesto.p1_desc: Pure innovation without third-party debt or external capital burden.
manifesto.p2_desc: Global engineering discipline in every line of Go-Lang native code.
manifesto.p3_desc: Protecting pioneer assets from the upcoming quantum computing threats.

architecture.title: TECHNICAL ARCHITECTURE
architecture.item1_desc: Pure Go-lang native implementation. High-performance multithreading optimized for ultra-light hardware (4GB RAM).
architecture.item2_desc: Advanced Proof-of-Stake with Byzantine Fault Tolerance. Ensuring instant finality and zero forking risk.
architecture.item3_desc: Dual-layer Post-Quantum Security using Crystals-Dilithium (Signatures) and Crystals-Kyber (Encryption).
